subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Deuce McAllister said that he had a magnetic resonance imaging exam on Tuesday that confirmed he tore his left anterior cruciate ligament in Monday’s 31-14 loss to the Titans.
snippet: Deuce McAllister said that he had a magnetic resonance imaging exam on Tuesday that confirmed he tore his left anterior cruciate ligament in Monday’s 31-14 loss to the Titans.
